Text: I wish it didn't have to be patch crack patch crack patch crack...
Why the game is laggy after the patch installation?

Im having a problem different to most people's. After installing this patch and it's crack, I go offline and launch the UpLauncher. When the PLAY button goes active, clicking on it will only shut the whole app down. Any ideas? I've also tried executing testdrive2.exe while the launcher is open.

After i installed the patch the game is laggy?
Any ideas?

is the "crack" broken or?

It asks me to authenticate the game online after I click play, and yes the game and UPLauncher is blocked.

when I double click on the .exe windows comes with an error.
Just a little box with a red cross in it.
It doesn't start
Fkin game sucks ass. Trust me.

I've encountered several problems now, but I solved them all.
With the new crack I couldn't start the game,
but I placed the old crack under the name 'testdrive_crack.exe' in the game folder and I loaded that one while having uplauncher opened and now I can play the game while the patches still work:)
Also, just disconnect internet, after you started the game you can again connect, but this is a precaution because sometimes firewall doesn't block the program properly.
Further, always start the uplauncher, otherwise IT WON'T WORK!
Greets;)
